title: system crash when clicked on raise hand
body:
**Describe the bug**
In a meeting when clicking on raise hand my systenm crashed and the entire background green and the system froze

**To Reproduce**
Steps to reproduce the behavior:
1. Go to '.teams meeting.'
2. Click on '.raise hand.'
4. See error

**Expected behavior**
system not crashing

**Screenshots**
If applicable, add screenshots to help explain your problem.

**Desktop (please complete the following information):**
Linux gebruiker-pc 6.10.4-200.fc40.x86_64 #1 SMP PREEMPT_DYNAMIC Sun Aug 11 15:32:50 UTC 2024 x86_64 GNU/Linux
gebruiker@gebruiker-pc:~$ cat /etc/os
os-release  ostree/     
gebruiker@gebruiker-pc:~$ cat /etc/os-release 
NAME="Fedora Linux"
VERSION="40 (Forty)"
ID=fedora
VERSION_ID=40
VERSION_CODENAME=""
PLATFORM_ID="platform:f40"
PRETTY_NAME="Fedora Linux 40 (Forty)"
ANSI_COLOR="0;38;2;60;110;180"
LOGO=fedora-logo-icon
CPE_NAME="cpe:/o:fedoraproject:fedora:40"
DEFAULT_HOSTNAME="fedora"
HOME_URL="https://fedoraproject.org/"
DOCUMENTATION_URL="https://docs.fedoraproject.org/en-US/fedora/f40/system-administrators-guide/"
SUPPORT_URL="https://ask.fedoraproject.org/"
BUG_REPORT_URL="https://bugzilla.redhat.com/"
REDHAT_BUGZILLA_PRODUCT="Fedora"
REDHAT_BUGZILLA_PRODUCT_VERSION=40
REDHAT_SUPPORT_PRODUCT="Fedora"
REDHAT_SUPPORT_PRODUCT_VERSION=40
SUPPORT_END=2025-05-13

 - Installation package flatpack
 - Version 1.9.0
